Name: Pixa Clicker
About the game: Pixa Clicker is a Point & Click Idle Clicker with a connected RPG, in which the objective is to earn an absurd amount of money. To do this you'll need a lot of stores that offer a variety of items or jobs. CURRENT DEVELOPMENT STATUS Over 250+ upgrades Over 50+ achievements Interact with people and explore the city CONTENT IN DEVELOPMENT Different Missions Random events such as fires, lightning strikes, etc. Minigames Analyze Graphs more achievements more possibilities for interaction and much more will follow in the future! Collect money and spend it to earn even more money!
